metadata.Name: KaoKore
metadata.Description: A dataset of pre-modern Japanese art facial expressions.
metadata.Paper Title: KaoKore: A Pre-modern Japanese Art Facial Expression Dataset
metadata.Abstract: We introduce KaoKore, a novel dataset of pre-modern Japanese art facial expressions. KaoKore consists of 1,100 images of facial expressions extracted from ukiyo-e (Japanese woodblock prints) and other pre-modern Japanese paintings. Each image is annotated with the emotion expressed by the facial expression. We also provide a baseline for emotion classification using a pre-trained convolutional neural network. Our experiments show that the baseline model achieves reasonable performance on the KaoKore dataset. We believe that KaoKore will be a valuable resource for researchers in computer vision, art history, and related fields.
